feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
